title: Need Customer Service Representative candidates from the United States
snippet:
Customer Service Representative

We have an immediate opening for a call center representative.

Duties will include:
-Answering calls and handling customers who has suffered hail damage.
-Scheduling appointments for estimates and repairs
-Making outbound calls to customers regarding their repairs.
-Using scheduling software.
-The ability to work well under pressure and handle multiple tasks at once.
-Attention to detail and great phone presence.
-Answering phone calls with a friendly, calm, and collected tone and delivering a great phone presence.

Qualifications:

-Must have some sort of customer service experience, preferably in a call center setting.
-Must be Bilingual
-Experience in the automotive industry or with auto insurance is preferred but not required.
